name: St. Ansgar

locations.description: Bishop of Hamburg, missionary to Scandinavia

summary: Ansgar was a Frankish missionary who is known as the Apostle of the North. He was the first Archbishop of Hamburg and worked to convert the Danes and Swedes to Christianity. He faced many hardships, including the destruction of his churches by Viking raids, but persevered in his missionary work. He is the patron saint of Scandinavia.
